phrases: Crap, I am too dragged into her pace.
I stepped on it when I was half-asleep.
Jin, go buy me a new one.
One that can withstand an elephant's stomp.
Go find a stick which is not so unlucky.
I will not forget that woman's expression.
The usage instructions are written on the inside.
Remember to spread some newspapers, okay?
And your breakfast is in the kitchen.
Remember to place the dishes in the water after eating.
I am going out for a bit...
I do not know why, but I feel like crying!
I woke up to their calls this morning!
I could not hear anything though.
Oh yeah, I heard a stray cat just gave birth recently, are these its offsprings?
Jin, I just thought of something!
I heard they have a mother.
You cannot kidnap cats, can you?
Besides, our house is a rented one, so keeping pets is forbidden.
I am going to withdraw some money now.
At least... at least give them some milk!
You cannot feed the kittens cow's milk.
Your breasts are too small to give any milk, so give up.
Haw haw haw haw haw... that is what you are thinking, right?
I am not thinking about that.
If a kitten does not drink milk for one day, it will die of dehydration!
We just need to check them once in a while.
She sure does not behave like one.
I TOLD you to spread some newspapers, did not I?!
This is not like what you are thinking!
I do not know about this?
The truth is, I have split personalities, so this was her fault...
Cook up a better lie next time!
Wow, what is with this perfect adhesion!
It is been quite a while so it is totally glued on!
There is no such ornament in a dining table!
He is acting a bit strange.
It is tough for a boy to be living on his own.
He definitely needs a cute childhood friend to support him.
And why are not you bothered by me handling it?
I am busy, and it takes the same effort anyway.
It is just that I do not feel like doing it.
Besides, if I get seen by others...
The one talking to you on the phone yesterday?
She is the person that you should not be meeting the most!
She is Tsugumi, my childhood friend.
My father entrusted me to her...
If she finds out that I am cohabiting with a woman I do not know, it is over...
That I am causing trouble for you?
You are so late to notice that!
You have been causing me trouble since yesterday!
Anyway, I will go explain to her.
You do not need to explain...
No, I do not mean that.
I should not be interfering in your relationship...
But if you skip school like that, I am not sure how to answer to your father...
I apologize for my impertinence earlier.
I am Jin-kun's half sibling, born from a different mother.
Nobody told me about that before.
It is not a surprise that you would be shocked.
Jin-kun also came to know of me only yesterday.
You were behaving differently just now...
In the family I was raised in, even laughing aloud is prohibited.
The constant pressure caused my personality to split into two.
I am deeply sorry to have shown you a disgraceful side of me!
I cannot bear to stay in that house anymore!
I know that it is selfish of me, but this is the only place I can go to!
But will not they come to take you back soon if you stay here?
That family only think of me as a burden.
They will just pretend that I have simply vanished and not inquire to the police to look for me.
Oh my, that looks very delicious.
I cannot believe you are so articulate, leading her along like that.
Oh my, and I thought you finally understood that the stick situation was not Nagi's fault.
Nagi really knows nothing about that stick.
Please do not berate her for it.
Is it really okay to take her in?
Your father is working right now and you cannot contact him, right?
Well... but I do not have a choice.
It is hard to believe such a thing could happen.
But it is possible, taking your father into account...
Someone is talking about you, Father.
Say, I would like you to keep her situation a secret as much as possible.
She hopes you do so anyway.
I cannot just go on telling others about something like that.
But that is only if nothing happens.
You were entrusted to me, after all.
Remember to eat the side dishes.
Please send my regards to your mother.
There are omelets in there, so eat them, okay?
See you at school tomorrow then.
Looks like I will have to get some detachment solution.
Damn, how did it get stuck so cleanly in the middle?
That made me laugh my ass off!
While I was applying the adhesive, my hand slipped!
It made a beautiful half-turn and scored a ten-point landing!
It was magnificent, but I just burst into laughter!
I rolled around laughing for a while after that!
Wait a minute... why are you talking about that incident?
I have let the cat out of the bag.
I did that out of impulse!
Do not use your polite speech again!
Are you a god of misfortune?!
It is horrible, I saw it directly with my eyes!
Is not that the kittens' mother?
I woke up to their calls this morning!
How long ago was she not around anymore?
If a kitten does not drink milk for one day, it will die of dehydration!
If only I had listened to her...
You have dried up, have not you.
That is right, you do not know what hate is yet.
Will the earth of the netherworld be too hard for you?
It will be troublesome to prepare something else now.
It is troublesome, so how about noodles?
You will be fine if you are this energetic.
The kittens... died, did not they?
From what I saw, you have taken those kittens into your body...
You were also acting like a different person.
Of course I am able to use powers that are beyond human understanding.
Do I need to explain each and every detail to you?
Know your place, child of humans!
Can you just give me an explanation?
After all, I am the one who carried you into the house.
That cup noodle is also mine.
I never asked you to save me!
Hey, what is with that attitude of yours?
Are you an elementary school student?
A follower like you is a few hundred years too young to be worried for his god!
I will not help you again if anything happens!
I do not need your help in the first place!
Without me, you do not even have anything to eat!
I do not want your crap!
You have been doing whatever you wanted since yesterday!
I do not care whether you are a god or not!
I am not going to put up with your bullshit any longer!
If you are not happy, leave!
Because he asked me such weird things...
There is something frilly attached to it.
Someone must have forgotten it and left it here.
It is used to decorate the altar in my house!
I exorcise bad demons with this.
Are not you just a weirdo?
I knew she is a weirdo.
Miss Weirdo, we are going to play, so do not bother us.
Do not tell me if you collect seven of these...
Um... I think I will go home.
Miipu, you are saying that again!
You are always like that lately.
But these days I cannot enjoy myself...
And things just are not going well...
Father and Mother are quarreling too...
Quarrels happen every day in my house too!
Never mind, just leave him alone.
I do not care about him.
Your troubles are within the jurisdiction of a priestess...
There is an impurity clinging onto your back!
Now's the time for an exorcism!
I thought she is a weirdo, but she is a fraud?
Mama says that they will ask a lot of money for offerings.
I will not take any money from you!
Hurry up and show me your back!
An impurity is a naughty, naughty bug.
In your case, it looks like a frog.
Humans can get along well with impurities in their daily lives.
But impurities that have turned into bugs are distinctly different.
They are beings that have solidified from people's hatred and negative emotions.
When they possess people, they turn into misfortunes.
But as long as we have this purification staff!
A purification staff is a god's cleansing-
It is just one impurity, I can beat it without Jin's help!
I just need to finish it off in one attack.
I should go and call Jin...
I cannot ask him for help after how I have treated him!
A place out of people's sight.
An enclosed space with no blind spots.
Come at me anytime, you impurity!
I will give you a clean hit with this purification staff!
Just like Sharapova returning a ball.
I cannot see it at all!
Is my plan backfiring on me?
You made me look all over for you.
Here, hurry up and kill it.
A beautiful girl, a land deity and a guardian deity!
I will not forgive the impurities!
You should have lured the ball to a place where it cannot bounce around, like a grassland.
Besides, you have poor reflexes, do not you?
Umm... are you mad at me?
Knowing what kind of person you are, I resigned myself.
I am used to dealing with your type of people.
I have bought you a rice bowl anyway, I do not want it to go to waste.
I do not have much of a choice, huh?
Why are you used to my type of people?
My father is like that too.
Did you get spanked by your father as a child?
With a weird father, your butt's got it tough.
Miipu, you talk like an old man!
Watch the next episode of Kannagi too!
